title: Managing a large inbox
content: Understand that TB does not have an upper limit to size of inboxes. I run a email-driven micro business and my imap inboxes grow in size very very rapidly. I have a super large storage with my email provider so storage is not an issue. I wonder if imap sub-folders can have less issues compared to a single imap inbox. Any advice will be appreciated.
creator: nospam17

title: Zoom not working with 'ctrl +' unless ...
content:
When reading received Emails, I try to use the combination of the 'ctrl' and the '+' key's, --by default will not work until/unless I first use one of the View\Zoom sub-menu item's. By comparison, while 'composing' or 'replying', the combination of the 'ctrl' plus '+' key's will work by default.

This has always been the case for the past year; if not longer.
creator: query-01

title: Automated Ai chat bot agents wasting my time?!
content:
I run a B2B manufacturing business.. All based online, they send us their job and we get it made. I keep getting enquiries from @gmail or @yahoo and they all look the same and sound the same. All are what look like genuine enquiries, and most have ugly Ai generated images as their 'artwork designs'. I can spot these from a mile away now. But the conversations keep dragging on and on, as if it's a chat bot trying to learn language and interaction. To the point now where we have had to create copy and paste blocks of messages as well as have a strict policy of closing the sale as soon as possible and it's wasting valuable time. We even try to get them on the phone as soon as possible, some even zoom calls (which I refuse to take) and my business partner says they are real people, but I am convinced even that is possible to fake these days.

Are there people out there now creating these Ai agents and unleashing them into the world to go and waste people's time so they can learn language with real interactions?!? I do not have time for this! Anyone else experiencing this??
creator: hamster540

title: Post automatically deleted?
content: I posted a questions about Ai agents and how these emials are clogging up my Thunderbird emails.. And wondered if there was a way to tackle this, but post was automatically deleted 10 seconds after... what's going on??

content:
I need some help.

I receive Thunderbird inputs and automatically place them into various folders based upon who sent it.

creator: jbrennan1

title: Thunderbird leaves screen after an action in the screen
content:
Two things that happen that more or less come under the "Subject".

When composing an email, and inserting an image (e.g. signature) the email being worked in shifts to the background and Thunderbird goes back to the main page. This means I have to take steps to get back to the email I am working on.

When bringing up a search in a Thunderbird folder with Ctrl-Sft-F, and getting the Search box then choosing an email to check, when that email is closed Thunderbird does not stay with the Search box but goes back to the main page. This means I have to take steps to get back to the Search box I am working in.

Thanks for your volunteer time and for investigating this. Steve
creator: ssum

title: Mail sunucuma bağlanamıyorum
content:
İşletim Sistemi: Linux (Debian) Thunderbird sürüm: 128.13.0esr

Disroot.org uzantılı mail adresimi hesap olarak ekleyemiyorum. Disroot.org sitesinde belirtilen ayarları kullanıyorum, şifrem doğru fakat "Thunderbird, e-posta hesabınızın ayarlarını bulamadı" diyor. Disroot.org ile de sorunumu ilettim ayarların doğru olduğunu, Thunderbird tarafı ile görüşmem gerektiğini söylediler. Telefonda ve tablette de thunderbird kullanıyorum bu mail adresi ile bağlıyım. Yalnız tabletten hesabımı kaldırıp tekrar bağlamak istediğmde yine hesap ekleyemedim. Bu sunucuyu yeniden eklettirmiyor gibi bir durum var. Başka bir mail uygulaması ile bağlanabildim bu arada. Sorun nerede olabilir?

title: het verzenden van een email mislukt.
content: Ik heb recentelijk thunderbird geinstalleerd. Ik wilde een email versturen, maar dat lukte niet. Ik kreeg de melding: er is een fout opgetreden bij het verzenden van e-mail. De mailserver antwoordde: unable to relay without authentication. Controleer of uw e-mail adres juist in ingesteld in uw accountinstellingen en probeer het opnieuw. Reactie: ik heb het ingestelde e-mail adres gecontroleerd. Dat is juist. Ik weet nu niet wat ik verder moet doen. Kunt u mij helpen. Bij voorbaat dank. G.D. Vrolijk

title: IMAP Trash not displaying deleted messages, but indicates messages exist.
content:
I have setup a new IMAP with Thunderbird and my deleted messages are not displaying in the Trash area. I am currently on release version 141.0 (64 bit). I am running it on Windows 11 Pro service pack 24H2. I do not have any antivirus setup at this time.

First off I have multiple Trash bins, one for each account listed under the Inbox and then one in the Local Folders area, so I am not completely sure why the Local Folders one exists and what it's purpose is for. When I delete a message from the DrReilly account it is removed from the Inbox and and I see the number count go up on my Trash folder under the Inbox. However, when I go to the Trash folder it is completely empty but indicates I have messages in it (see Screenshot 1). I have toggled Unread, Stared, Contacts, Tags, & Attachments and the messages never show. I have verified that when I delete a message it is supposed to direct the messages to the Trash bin (see Screenshot 2).

The interesting thing is my issue is only with the DrReilly account, the deleted messages are showing up in the AHAH account (also an IMAP) with no issues. The only thing I can see different about the 2 accounts is that in the AHAH account folders it has a Trash & a Trash.msf file (see Screenshot 4) and the DrReilly account folders only have the Trash.msf file (see Screenshot 3).

I have tried everything I can find with a search and nothing seems to resolve the issue.

Can someone please help?
creator: cbetguy

title: Junk/Not Junk
content:
I've done everything I can think of to get Thunderbird to "learn" what is Junk or Not Junk. It does pretty well tagging spam as Junk. But it also tags legitimate email as Junk. I mark those as Not Junk. I add the addresses to my Address Book. But for the most part the errors continue.

It's an annoyance. I can, of course, just ignore the whole thing and click thruough the Junk folder. But I'd prefer not to. Any suggestions as to what else I can try?

Thank. you.

title: taskbar icon does not show all new mail
content:
For as long as I can remember the taskbar icon has given me a number of all new messages. Even those that I have Thunderbird move to specific folders as they're downloaded. Recently, however, the only number showing on the taskbar icon are new messages in the inbox folder and not in the lower folders, such as /bills/state farm or /games/EA. The only thing I've changed was an update, which I had the system do automatically. I didn't change anything within that update. What changed in my Thunderbird that only shows the number of new messages in the inbox and not in lower folders as well?

My settings in Thunderbird include under Incoming Mails, Change preferences for the app icon; Show badge icon is checked and Count of unread messages is selected.

Windows 11 settings in Personalization/Taskbar/Taskbar behaviors; Show badges on taskbar apps is checked.

How do I get the number of all of my new messages to show up again on my Thunderbird taskbar icon?

title: "Tools", "View", "Help", etc. boxes gone from top of page
content: There used to be a row of actions I could take listed across the top of the T'Bird main page. Buttons for File, View, Tools, Help, and some others. They no longer appear, I guess after a recent update. I occasionally show having a message in my inbox which does not appear anywhere on my list. I used to go into one of those areas (maybe tools or view, don't remember) and select "Unread" and find those messages. Without those boxes to pick from I can no longer do that, and it really bugs me that my notification always says I have 1 message even though I have cleared all the highlighted messages. I have slowly scrolled all the way to the end of my undeleted emails and there are none in bold type to indicate it is unread. Can anyone tell me why those buttons disappeared and whether or not I can get them back ? At the least can someone please advise me as to how to find the 1 elusive message ? Any help greatly appreciated. A secondary issue, since an update over a year ago, I can no longer send messages from this account or reply to any messages sent to me. I have tried everything I can from the Mozilla Knowledge base, and even called Comcast, whose internet connection I was using when I set up the account (now on Spectrum). All my computer settings seem to be correct. I really love Thunderbird and it's ease of use and control, but I'm going to have to quit it if I can't resolve these issues. Again, thanks for any help.
creator: cdavidwright

title: Errore certificato con casella Virgilio: impossibile accettare eccezione di sicurezza
content:
Buongiorno, utilizzo Thunderbird su Linux Mint con una casella email @virgilio.it. Da qualche giorno, quando avvio la ricezione della posta, compare un avviso di errore di certificato. Il problema è che non compare l’opzione per accettare l’eccezione di sicurezza, quindi non posso proseguire e scaricare i messaggi.

Ho già provato a:

Chiudere e riavviare Thunderbird.

Avviare in Modalità risoluzione problemi.

Controllare le impostazioni dell’account e le porte.

Il problema persiste. Come posso forzare o abilitare l’accettazione dell’eccezione di sicurezza per questo certificato?

Allego screenshot dell’errore.

Grazie per l’attenzione.

Nicola Frenza

title: Compacting folders happens very frequently
content:
Recently I've noticed that Thunderbird asks to compact folders very frequently and if I say 'later' the size of the file needing compacting grows substantially each time (typ. 3 to 5 GB increase). See attached screenshot When I finally tell it to compact folders, the message pane goes blank but usually (but not always) returns. When it does come back there is an error window (See attached screenshot )

This is a new phenomenon and is making Thunderbird a pain to use: it wastes time and is scary when the Mozilla support pages say it can lose messages. I'm reluctant to have it do compacting automatically.

Can this bug be fixed? I'm on 138.0.1 on Win 11, but the question in support only customizes to 128. Probably irrelevant. I have plenty of disk space and RAM space available

I'm a decades long Eudora/Thunderbird user and don't want to have to change to something else. Thunderbird is great, except for this.

Help please. Thanks,
